Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan pad ān ī fradom zōhr andar hōm pālā kunišn pad xšaϑrəmcā bē afšārišn pad dudīgar ud sidīgar ud čahārom bē afšārišn rāspīg pad gāh ī hāwanān aṣ̌əm vohū ēk guftan

"He should recite the yaθā ahū vairiiō four times. During the first one, he has to pour the zōhr into the hōm-pālā. At xšaϑrəmcā, he has to strain (the hōm and urwarām). During the second, third and fourth (yaθā ahū vairiiō), he has to strain them. The rāspīg should recite one aṣ̌əm vohū at the place of the hāwanān."

zōt ud rāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō čahār pad fradom yaθā ahū vairiiō pad xš́iiaoθənanąm hāwandastag pad sar ī hōm pālā dāštan ud hōm ud hāwan abar sar ī hāwandastag pad harw xš́iiaoθənanąm afšārdan rāspīg pad gāh ī hāwanān aṣ̌əm vohū ēk

"The zōt and the rāspīg (should recite) four yaθā ahū vairiiō. During the first, at xš́iiaoθənanąm, he should hold the hāwandastag on the rim of the hōm pālā and bring the hōm and hāwan to the end the hāwandastag. At each xš́iiaoθənanąm, he should strain (the hōm and urwarām). The rāspīg at the place of the hāwanān (should say) one aṣ̌əm vohū."
